item.description:
November 19 and 20, 2011 In front of the rebuilt World Trade Center Building 7

March from Liberty Plaza to WTC 7 @ 12PM each day.

DEMAND an investigation into the destruction of World Trade Center Building 7 and the Twin Towers   Help Spread the Word:   Distribute Fliers   Post Web Badges for Your Website      

 

Evidence
  • Silverstein Statement
  • Free Fall Collapse
  • Collapse Model
  • Sulfidated Steel
  • Explosive Residues
  • Eyewitnesses
  • Foreknowledge
  • Destruction of Evidence

Click image for larger preview
Occupy Building 7 - November 19-20
12PM march from Liberty Plaza to WTC 7.
Occupy WTC 7 park until 6pm each day.

1st General Assembly at 2pm to discuss
the direction and continuation of the
Occupy Building 7 occupation after 11/20.
How To Occupy | General Assembly Guide

September 11, 2001 - the day our country was hijacked and a permanent war was launched that will not end in our lifetime unless we the 99% stop it.

Ten years later the War on Terrorism has diverted trillions of dollars from more important uses and sunken our country into debt.

Building 7, which most people don’t know about, came crashing to the ground at 5:20pm on September 11th. Today, millions of citizens and 1,600 courageous architects and engineers are demanding an investigation into the suspect destruction of this skyscraper.

The government's absurd story that "normal office fires" felled this 47-story skyscraper is only the tip of the iceberg of the anomalies and inconsistencies we've been given about 9/11.

Today we are taking our country back. We will not rest until those responsible for the death of 3,000 innocent people on 9/11 are brought to justice, and the war


Source URL and more info - http://occupybuilding7.org/

 

Note from Jonathan..

This may be the most important action since the Occupation Wall Street Movement had begun. I cannot commit to coming to this key action at this time, but will spread the word wide and far. Thanks to all bringing awareness to the importance of looking into the (cover-up) event, which was used to justify a series of seemingly endless wars and loss of our civil liberties and human rights. Let us know if you can make it!

Manny Badillo said he would download "A Message from Senator Mike Gravel to the Occupy Wall Street Movement" - pdf file for double sided hand-out.. http://files.meetup.com/300645/A%20Message%20from%20Senator%20Gravel%20to%20OWS%202011.pdf

 

United we stand, divided we fall.
item.how_to_find_us: I cannot commit to coming to this key action at this time, but want to spread the word wide and far..
item.name: Occupy Building 7
